metadata.title: CVE-2024-4367 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A type check was missing when handling fonts in PDF.js, which would allowarbitrary JavaScript execution in the PDF.js context. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 126, Firefox ESR < 115.11, and Thunderbird < 115.11.

criterions.comment: mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
